description: This file defines a Qwik route layout component for a web application. It handles server-side caching, loads server time data, and renders a header, footer, and main content via slot.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Handles the GET request, sets cache control headers to optimize caching and performance.

methods.name: useServerTimeLoader
methods.description: Loads current server time as part of route data.

methods.name: default
methods.description: Defines the main layout component that renders header, footer, and slot content.
